Package cellularAutomata.util.graphics

Class Summary
AnalysisButtonTabComponent Component to be used as tabComponent for Analysis tabs.
GlassPane Graphics that cover the entire CAFrame with a specified transparency.
HalfTransparentGlassPane Graphics that cover the entire CAFrame.
PulsatingBorder Creates a border that pulsates.
PulsatingBorderJButton Creates a JButton with text that pulsates.
PulsatingJEditorPane Creates a JEditorPane that pulsates.
PulsatingJMenuItem Creates a JMenuItem that pulsates.
PulsatingJPanel Creates a JPanel that pulsates.
PulsatingJTextField Creates a JTextField that pulsates.
PulsatingTextJButton Creates a JButton with text that pulsates.
RotatedImageIcon Creates an ImageIcon that is rotated by the specified number of degrees when painted.
ShakingIconJButton Creates a JButton with an icon that shakes indefinitely until told to stop.
ShimmyingTenTimesIconJButton Creates a JButton with an icon that shimmies 10 times.
ShrinkingJFrame Creates a JFrame that shrinks when exiting.
SpinningIconJButton Creates a JOptionPane with an icon that spins.
SpinningIconJOptionPane Creates a JOptionPane with an icon that spins.
TranslatedImageIcon Creates an ImageIcon with its upper left corner positioned at the specified coordinate.
